mapper.select: SELECT hotel_type,COUNT(*) AS hotel_num FROM hotel_comment a GROUP BY a.hotel_type
SELECT hotel_type,SUM(a.room_num) AS room_num FROM hotel_comment a GROUP BY a.hotel_type

SELECT hotel_type AS '类型', AVG( hotel_credit_rate ) AS '酒店好评率', AVG( food_review_rate ) AS '食物评论率', AVG( price_review_rate ) AS '价格评论率', AVG( server_review_rate ) AS '服务评论率', AVG( health_review_rate ) AS '卫生评论率', AVG( device_review_rate ) AS '设备评论率' FROM hotel_comment a GROUP BY hotel_type

SELECT hotel_type AS '类型', ( AVG( hotel_credit_rate ) + AVG( food_review_rate ) + AVG( price_review_rate ) + AVG( server_review_rate ) + AVG( health_review_rate ) + AVG( device_review_rate ) )/6 AS 平均好评率 FROM hotel_comment a GROUP BY hotel_type
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hotel_comment( hotel_id, hotel_type, hotel_name, hotel_company, police, address, room_num, bed_num, create_time, telephone, hotel_credit_rate, food_review_rate, price_review_rate, server_review_rate, health_review_rate, device_review_rate, traffic_review_rate, locate ) VALUES ( #{hotel_id}, #{hotel_type}, #{hotel_name}, #{hotel_company}, #{police}, #{address}, #{room_num}, #{bed_num}, #{create_time}, #{telephone}, #{hotel_credit_rate}, #{food_review_rate}, #{price_review_rate}, #{server_review_rate}, #{health_review_rate}, #{device_review_rate}, #{traffic_review_rate}, #{locate} )
